titleStmt.title: Day's dyall, or, His twelve howres that is, twelve severall lectures by way of catechisme, as they were delivered by him in the chappel of Oriell Colledge in Oxford, in the yeeres of our Lord God 1612, and 1613.
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1566-1628.

notesStmt.note: Pages 177 and 181 misnumbered as 181 and 175 respectively.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
